connect(InetAddress, int) - Method in class Client.Client
This boolean method should return true on success or false on failure, in terms of a client connecting to a specific port of server In case an exception is thrown, then print out the message indicating the error, then close the socket and return false Finally, this method will initialize BufferedReader and BufferedWriter based on the recent created socket
connect(InetAddress, int) - Method in interface Client.OthelloClient
The boolean methods should return true on success or false on failure, for example when the connection is broken
